Package com.infinityrefactoring.reflections

Utilities for facilitate the handling of Class, Field, Method and others elements of the Java Reflection API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InstanceFactory
    Represents an instance factory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayNode
    Represents an array node of a path expression.
    ClassWrapper<T>
    Wraps a java class for facilitate the handling of your members, using the Java Reflection API.
    DelegatedInstanceFactory
    This instance factory delegate the building process to a specific factory, if exists a factory for the given class, otherwise uses the default constructor.
    ExpressionNode
    Represents a node of a path expression.
    FieldNode
    Represents an field node of a path expression.
    MethodNode
    Represents an method node of a path expression.
    PathExpression
    Represents a path expression, that can be used to access nested fields or methods of a given root object.
    Predicates
    Utility class with static methods that returns a Predicate for filter a Class, Member, Field or Method.
    Reflections
    This is an utility class for facilitates the access, of centralized way, to the principal functionalities of the "com.infinityrefactoring.reflections" package.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ModifierType
    Represents a modifier type of the Java Language.

Package com.infinityrefactoring.reflections Description

Utilities for facilitate the handling of Class, Field, Method and others elements of the Java Reflection API.
